original_text: Putting their little children, their livestock and their possessions in front of them, they turned away and left.
korean_text: 그들이 돌이켜서 어린 아이들과 가축과 값진 물건들을 앞세우고 길을 떠나더니

sentences.original_text: Putting their little children in front of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 어린 아이들을 그들 앞에 두고

sentences.original_text: their livestock in front of them
and their possessions in front of them
